text: Castle Keep is a 1969 American World War II comedy-drama movie directed by Sydney Pollack and was based on the 1965 novel of the same name by William Eastlake. It stars Burt Lancaster, Patrick O'Neal, Jean-Pierre Aumont, Peter Falk, Scott Wilson, Tony Bill, James Patterson, Bruce Dern, Michael Conrad and was distributed by Columbia Pictures. ==Other websites== * * * * * Category:1969 war movies Category:1969 comedy-drama movies Category:American comedy-drama movies Category:American war movies Category:World War II movies Category:Movies directed by Sydney Pollack Category:Columbia Pictures movies Category:Movies set in the 1940s Category:Movies set in Belgium Category:Movies set in Serbia Category:Movies set in castles
title: Castle Keep
